thread.title_full: Report: Lakers trade Lou Williams to Rockets for Corey Brewer, first-round pick - CBSSports.com

author: Matt Moore
title: Report: Lakers trade Lou Williams to Rockets for Corey Brewer, first-round pick - CBSSports.com
text:
6m ago • 1 min read 
The Los Angeles Lakers have reportedly traded Lou Wiliams to the Houston Rockets for Corey Brewer and a first-round pick. The move adds another capable scorer to the Rockets’ barrage of 3-point shooters, and gets the Lakers a first-round pick in exchange for taking Brewer, who makes slightly more between now and next season when his contract expires at the same time as Williams’. 
More to come on this trade.
